name: The mirror of Seil
description:
THE MIRROR OF SEIL :

A magical mirror that  let you connect with the world of the lies . Guide Yourself and find who you really are.

Gameplay :

2D platformer with double realities xD

Notes :

There is bunch of features that were supposed to be in the game but due to the lack of time there didn't make it. (missing Fragment texture, SoundFx, ...)

Enjoy.....
